00023 <div id="main" class="clearfix">
00024     <style type="text/css">
00025         p.italic { font-style: italic; }
00026         p.underline { text-decoration: underline; }
00027         p.green { background-color: green }
00028         p.red { background-color: red }
00029         p.underline.red { font-variant: small-caps; }
00030     </style>
00031     
00032     <p class="italic green">
00033         This paragraph has <code>class="italic green"</code> It should be italic and green.
00034     </p>
00035     <p class="underline green">
00036         This paragraph has <code>class="underline green"</code> It should be underlined and green.
00037     </p>
00038     <p class="italic red">
00039         This paragraph has <code>class="italic red"</code> It should be italic and red.
00040     </p>
00041     <p class="underline red">
00042         This paragraph has <code>class="underline red"</code> It should be underlined, red, 
00043         and it should use small-caps.
00044     </p>
00045 </div>
